law.catch_line: There is a body corporate and politic known as Morgan State University....

section.section: There is a body corporate and politic known as Morgan State University.
The University is an instrumentality of the State and a public corporation.
The University is an independent unit of State government.
The exercise by the University of the powers conferred by this subtitle is the performance of an essential public function.
In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board of Regents" means the Board of Regents of Morgan State University.
